content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day August 23, 2022 3 Ways to Optimize Your Security Awareness Training Program August 23, 2022 Despite investments of time and money in secure email gateways, phishing threats continue to be delivered to the users inbox. To close this gap in automated detection, many organizations roll out user security awareness programs to train their employees to spot and avoid these threats.
